snippet.title: Flockers: Official Release Trailer (Team17) - Xbox One, PS4, Steam (PC)
snippet.description:
Flockers is coming to PS4, Xbox One and Steam from 19th September 2014! (PS4 version available 23rd September 2014 in US)

New from the creators of Worms™, Flockers is a modern day take on the classic A to B puzzle genre with a generous helping of dark humour for good measure. Set hoof into this sinister, steampunk inspired world as you navigate the hapless sheep through 60 dark, heinous puzzles and 6 further secret levels in an attempt to save them from their impending doom!

►Flockers on Steam: http://bit.ly/Flockers◄

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FlockersGame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/FlockersGame
Subscribe on YouTube: http://bit.ly/SubscribeT17

►More Flockers Videos! https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLjkadU1Gs-CEKvW3LRSFnLsBgEpO-KMBa◄
